name: Slimey's Quest
description:
Play as Slimey – a little slime who wants to go on an adventure. In this short platforming game you play as a slime who just wants to press buttons. Use the arrows to move and explore in this (very) short adventure.

Created in ~10 hours for Ludum Dare 31. Rate here: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-31/?action=preview&uid=25578
